title: Riot Awesome Support
body:
I just wanted to say thank you to Riot and their support team because I know that mostly people post things when they are angry and frustrated. I had my account hacked into for the first time in 8 years (yes, I realized I have been playing that long when I looked up when beta started). I requested a refund for the gifts that were stolen from my rp points through the wrong form. Within a week they told me that I made a mistake and within a day of correcting it everything was refunded correctly. I greatly appreciate this and I wish I had more time to give back to the community these days beyond being a civil and educational player.

Thanks again and feel free to respond with your thanks.

King {{champion:33}} 4 life, It is good to be king.

replies.body: It was really nice to see your post this morning, and I'm so glad that we were able to help out.  Thanks for not only keeping your account safe for so long, but also confiding in us to help.  I'll let SoGnar know about this post, as I'm sure it'll make his day.  Thanks again, and ok!  {{champion:33}}
